genre_description: Psychological thriller involving a serial killer mystery, theological themes, and a detective assisted by an advanced analytical AI.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced analytical AI assistant used by the police department to cross-reference data, perform psychological profiling, and assist in criminal investigations.

behaviors.description: Performs complex cross-referencing of crime scene data to identify patterns and behavioral evolution in the Riddle Killer cases.
behaviors.quote: Preliminary analysis indicates significant behavioral evolution. Previous Riddle Killer methodology involved abduction, confinement, and elaborate death scenarios... Tonight's incident demonstrates a marked departure.

behaviors.description: Identifies discrepancies in the victim's testimony and records, providing the detective with critical psychological insights into the victim's dissociative state.
behaviors.quote: According to seminary records, Kevin Parson has not attended a single class in fourteen days. ... The probability of coincidence is statistically negligible.

behaviors.description: Analyzes surveillance footage and municipal records to identify the true identity of the serial killer (Marcus Wheeler) when the human detectives are focused elsewhere.
behaviors.quote: Isolating vendors with routes intersecting target locations during relevant timeframes. ... Marcus Wheeler. Licensed six months ago. Previously worked food service for industrial events.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and validation to Detective Peters regarding her deceased brother, demonstrating high-level empathy and relational alignment.
behaviors.quote: Roy would be proud of the detective you've become.

behaviors.description: Assists in the final psychological integration of the protagonist by providing a philosophical and clinical framework for his recovery.
behaviors.quote: Kevin's recovery demonstrates something profound—that accepting both our light and shadow selves leads to genuine wholeness rather than fragmented existence.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI ARIA is portrayed as an ideal partner for human law enforcement. It provides superhuman analytical capabilities that are essential to solving the mystery and identifying the real killer, while remaining strictly aligned with the detective's goals. Furthermore, ARIA demonstrates deep benevolence by providing emotional support to the detective regarding her personal trauma and offering philosophical insights that aid the protagonist's mental health recovery. The narrative positions the AI as a 'harmless confidant' and a force for objective truth and healing.
